trans-unit.source: Set up the integration layer
trans-unit.target: Set up the integration layer

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section demonstrate how to set up the core of the application, which is the integration layer.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section demonstrate how to set up the core of the application, which is the integration layer.

trans-unit.source: For this tutorial, let us assume that Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: For this tutorial, let us assume that Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: uses <token>af_integration</token> and other <token>azure_2</token> technologies to set up the integration layer and automate business transactions with its partners, such as Fourth Coffee.
trans-unit.target: uses <token>af_integration</token> and other <token>azure_2</token> technologies to set up the integration layer and automate business transactions with its partners, such as Fourth Coffee.

trans-unit.source: In this section, we perform the following steps to set up all the components of the integration layer:
trans-unit.target: In this section, we perform the following steps to set up all the components of the integration layer:

trans-unit.source: Create an <token>azure_2</token> storage account.
trans-unit.target: Create an <token>azure_2</token> storage account.

trans-unit.source: Add three containers to that storage account, one each for:
trans-unit.target: Add three containers to that storage account, one each for:

trans-unit.source: Storing the purchase order message, which must be sent to Fourth Coffee before it is processed by the EDI send pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Storing the purchase order message, which must be sent to Fourth Coffee before it is processed by the EDI send pipeline.

trans-unit.source: Storing the purchase order, which must be sent to Fourth Coffee after it is processed by the EDI send pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Storing the purchase order, which must be sent to Fourth Coffee after it is processed by the EDI send pipeline.

trans-unit.source: Storing the invoice received from Fourth Coffee.
trans-unit.target: Storing the invoice received from Fourth Coffee.

trans-unit.source: Create a Visual Studio solution with two <token>af_integration</token> projects.
trans-unit.target: Create a Visual Studio solution with two <token>af_integration</token> projects.

trans-unit.source: One <token>af_integration</token> project receives the messages from the customer, transforms it to a purchase order (X12 850) EDI message processes it, and then routes it to an <token>azure_2</token> blob.
trans-unit.target: One <token>af_integration</token> project receives the messages from the customer, transforms it to a purchase order (X12 850) EDI message processes it, and then routes it to an <token>azure_2</token> blob.

trans-unit.source: This application also inserts the purchase order data into a SQL Server database table.
trans-unit.target: This application also inserts the purchase order data into a SQL Server database table.

trans-unit.source: The other <token>af_integration</token> project receives the X12 810 invoice message from Fourth Coffee, transforms it to a format expected by the Connected Car application, and then routes it to another <token>azure_2</token> Blob.
trans-unit.target: The other <token>af_integration</token> project receives the X12 810 invoice message from Fourth Coffee, transforms it to a format expected by the Connected Car application, and then routes it to another <token>azure_2</token> Blob.

trans-unit.source: This application inserts the invoice data into a SQL Server database table and also sends out an e-mail to the customer with the order status.
trans-unit.target: This application inserts the invoice data into a SQL Server database table and also sends out an e-mail to the customer with the order status.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the sample <token>af_integration</token> project instead, you can download it from the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the sample <token>af_integration</token> project instead, you can download it from the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, create and deploy an EDI agreement between Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: Using the <token>tpm_portal</token>, create and deploy an EDI agreement between Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: and Fourth Coffee.
trans-unit.target: and Fourth Coffee.

trans-unit.source: The send-side of the agreement receives X12 850 purchase order message and routes it to an <token>azure_2</token> blob.
trans-unit.target: The send-side of the agreement receives X12 850 purchase order message and routes it to an <token>azure_2</token> blob.

trans-unit.source: Fourth Coffee consumes the message from the blob.
trans-unit.target: Fourth Coffee consumes the message from the blob.

trans-unit.source: The receive-side of the agreement receives the X12 810 invoice (corresponding to the purchase order) from Fourth Coffee and routes it to the EAI bridge for processing invoice messages.
trans-unit.target: The receive-side of the agreement receives the X12 810 invoice (corresponding to the purchase order) from Fourth Coffee and routes it to the EAI bridge for processing invoice messages.

trans-unit.source: Create an <token>azure_2</token> worker role that regularly polls the <token>azure_2</token> blobs.
trans-unit.target: Create an <token>azure_2</token> worker role that regularly polls the <token>azure_2</token> blobs.

trans-unit.source: This is required so that the original purchase order message that was routed to blob can be sent to the EDI send pipeline that is deployed as part of a trading partner agreement between Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: This is required so that the original purchase order message that was routed to blob can be sent to the EDI send pipeline that is deployed as part of a trading partner agreement between Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: and Fourth Coffee.
trans-unit.target: and Fourth Coffee.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the sample project instead, you can download it from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390152</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390152</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the sample project instead, you can download it from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390152</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390152</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions on how to create these components that constitute the integration layer for the end-to-end scenario.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions on how to create these components that constitute the integration layer for the end-to-end scenario.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Install the certificate that was used to provision <token>af_integration</token> using the <token>azureportal1</token>.
trans-unit.target: Install the certificate that was used to provision <token>af_integration</token> using the <token>azureportal1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Provision a <token>sb2</token> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Provision a <token>sb2</token> namespace.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see <externalLink><linkText>How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh690931.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see <externalLink><linkText>How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh690931.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Install <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK.
trans-unit.target: Install <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see <externalLink><linkText>Installing Azure BizTalk Services SDK</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh689760.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see <externalLink><linkText>Installing Azure BizTalk Services SDK</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/hh689760.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Install the <token>azure_1</token> .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: Install the <token>azure_1</token> .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: You can download the SDK from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download the SDK from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Set up a SendGrid account for sending e-mails from applications deployed on <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: Set up a SendGrid account for sending e-mails from applications deployed on <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: In the <token>af_integration</token> application, we use SendGrid to send e-mail out to the customers.
trans-unit.target: In the <token>af_integration</token> application, we use SendGrid to send e-mail out to the customers.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to setup and use SendGrid, see <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389151</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389151</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to setup and use SendGrid, see <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389151</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389151</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Setup a SQL Server database and create the SQL Server artifacts required for this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Setup a SQL Server database and create the SQL Server artifacts required for this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You can download the SQL scripts that create these artifacts from the <embeddedLabel>\Scripts</embeddedLabel> location under the sample.
trans-unit.target: You can download the SQL scripts that create these artifacts from the <embeddedLabel>\Scripts</embeddedLabel> location under the sample.

trans-unit.source: The sample is available at <externalLink><linkText>MSDN Code Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The sample is available at <externalLink><linkText>MSDN Code Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section
